revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Turris-mox-9.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Modular & Open-Source Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.turris.cz/en/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Turris_MOX |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CZ.NIC |model = Turris MOX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RTROM0X |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F3720; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-PBA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:58:D7 |oui = 04:F0:21
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;Turris OS;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = PCIe, Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SFP, |exp_minipcie_num = 4 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, populated,, 6-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, populated,, 34-pin header,, (SDIO,GPIO,I2C)
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SIM/microSD Card slot, GPIO, SDIO, UART, I2C |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Turris |defaultssid_regex = ^Turris$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/27/2018 |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE900VX |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== '''Modules''': The system is comprised of a *'''MOX A''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-a Basic Module]'': CPU: [[Marvell]] Armada 3720 (Dual-Core) :RAM: 512MB (DDR3), 1x USB 3.0, 1x GbE, GPIO, SDIO, UART and I2C Mini PCIe port that can currently be used by one to three modules as needed: *'''MOX B''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-b Extension Module]'': for 2.4/5GHz Wi-Fi card, SSD, LTE modem *'''MOX C''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-c Ethernet Module]'': with 4x GbE LAN port (RJ45) *'''MOX D''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-d SFP Module]'': to connect to 2.5Gbps fiber connection (FTTH) *'''MOX E''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-e Super Ethernet Module]'': with 8x GbE LAN port (RJ45) *'''MOX F''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-f USB Module]'': with 4x USB 3.0 port (project) *'''MOX G''' - ''[https://mox.turris.cz/en/specification/#mox-g Super Extension Module]'': with 1x Mini PCIe (project) Additional MOX modules due straddle mount PCIe 64-pin connector: :LTE modem (miniPCIe), SSD disc (miniPCIe or M2)
==Links of Interest== *{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}} [https://www.turris.cz/en/specification/ Spec.] {{•}} [https://mox.turris.cz/en/overview/ Overview] *[https://www.root.cz/galerie/turris-mox/ ''Turris MOX'' gallery]
===News=== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-mox-modular-open-source-router-wifi/coming_soon ''Turris MOX'' on '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[https://www.root.cz/clanky/turris-mox-modularni-router-si-sestavite-podle-potreby-z-jednotlivych-karet/ ''Turris MOX'' on '''root.cz'''] (internal images) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/03/27/turris-mox-is-a-modular-router-with-wifi-ssd-lte-modem-ethernet-and-sfp-fiber-modules-crowdfunding/ ''Turris MOX'' review on '''SNX-Software'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] ARMADA 3700LP (88F3720) • [http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/23/marvell-espressobin-board-with-gigabit-ethernet-sata-pcie-and-usb-3-0-to-launch-for-39-and-up-crowdfunding/ CNX] :Dual Core (ARMv8 Cortex-A53) CPU @1.2GHz
==See also== *[[Turris Omnia]] *[https://www.turris.cz/en/news/news-list/turris-cloud-1-april-2018/ Turris Cloud] ;)
===Models=== *'''Turris MOX Start''' (MOX A) - ''Router'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot *'''Turris MOX Power Wi-Fi''' (MOX A + MOX B) - ''Access Point'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot, :2.4/5GHz Dual-Band Wi‑Fi (2×2 2.4GHz/3×3 5GHz), SIM Card slot *'''Turris MOX Classic''' (MOX A + MOX B + MOX C) - ''WiFi Router'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 512MB DDR3, GbE WAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot, :2.4/5GHz Dual-Band Wi‑Fi (2×2 2.4GHz/3×3 5GHz), SIM, 4x GbE LAN *'''Turris MOX Cloud''' (MOX A + MOX F + RAM) - ''NAS'' :[[Marvell]] Armada 3720, 1GB DDR3, GbE WAN, 5x USB 3.0, microSD slot
[[Category:English Documentation]]
